---
title: "WhatsOb Data Merge"
---

# Load packages

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

# Merge merged-month files

## Global

```{r, message = FALSE}
fullData = list.files('MONTHLY', pattern = 'WhatsOb_Global_Data_', full.names = T) %>% map(read_csv) %>% reduce(bind_rows)
write_csv(fullData, 'WhatsOb_Global_Data5.30.22.csv', na = '')
```

## Ad lib

```{r, message = FALSE}
fullData = list.files('MONTHLY', pattern = 'WhatsOb_AdLib_Data_', full.names = T) %>% map(read_csv) %>% reduce(bind_rows)
write_csv(fullData, 'WhatsOb_AdLib_Data_5.30.22.csv', na = '')
```
